data.title: Anthony Quinn's son dies at 48
data.text:
Francesco Quinn, an actor and a son of the late Anthony Quinn, died of an apparent heart attack near his Malibu, Calif., home on Friday night, according to PEOPLE magazine.

The 48-year-old Quinn was reportedly running when he collapsed, and attempts to revive him by a neighbor failed. PEOPLE cites a report by the Malibu Patch, a local web site.

Quinn had a role in Oliver Stone's 1986 "Platoon" as the drug dealer Rhah. He later appeared on such TV series as "The Young and the Restless," "NCIS," "ER" and "24,"according to PEOPLE.

He is survived by his wife Valentina Castellani-Quinn and three children.
